task.title: Configure Network Modes
task.shortdesc: This section provides configuration instructions for networking modes. requires network connectivity between its clients (end-users) and the cloud components (e.g., CC, CLC, and Walrus).

taskbody.context: overlays a virtual network on top of your existing network. In order to do this, supports these networking modes: EDGE (AWS EC2 Classic compatible) and VPCMIDO (AWS VPC compatible).
